nbt.description: The NBT data to check for.
nbt.markdownDescription: The NBT data to check for.

type.description:
## NBT

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/nbt)

Checks the entity's NBT.

Type ID: `origins:nbt`



---

### ⚠️ Caution

Be cautious of using this entity condition type, as some NBT data *(e.g: tags added via `/tag`)* from the server are not synchronized to the client.



---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:nbt",
    "nbt": "{Tags: ['example_tag']}"
}
```

This example will check if the entity has the `example_tag` added via `/tag` or by modifying the entity's `Tags` NBT string list.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: NBT (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-10-02

NBT

Entity Condition Type

Checks the entity's NBT.

Type ID: origins:nbt

!!! caution

Be cautious of using this entity condition type, as some NBT data *(e.g: tags added via `/tag`)* from the server are not synchronized to the client.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
nbt NBT The NBT data to check for.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:nbt",
    "nbt": "{Tags: ['example_tag']}"
}

This example will check if the entity has the example_tag added via /tag or by modifying the entity's Tags NBT string list.
